name: Slime Dime
description:
A simple game I made for my brother in a week or so to play on the phone. I'll put it on the mobile store/stores when I buy the game engine license, for now I'll put it here. I've been talking to my other brother about making a single player campaign for this and we came up with a pretty good story for it and I'm planning on getting this on steam one day but for now it's on hold because I have other projects I have to finish.

It might still have some bugs and bad balancing with gun power and increasing difficulty since I didn't have time to fully test it, let me know and I'll fix them when I return to this project.

CONTROLS: Click or drag mouse
